item.description:
Oh man! Reel Big Fish is coming all the way from 90's California to play ska in modern day Boston! You may have heard their 1997 single "Sell Out" (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AEKbFMvkLIc) or their ska cover of "Take on Me" (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QHpU0ZfXZ_g). I highly recommend checking out their early albums; it's hard not to have a good time when you're listening to them. They also have a new album on the way tentatively named "Candy Coated Fury." All in all, you can expect a night of fun, high-energy, not-too-serious-about-itself ska.

Doors open at 6pm and the first band comes on at 7pm. Let's meet at the Lansdowne Pub by 6:30, and then we'll mosey down to the venue at 7pm. I'll send out my contact info the day of the show.
item.name: Reel Big Fish @ House of Blues - Sunday, January 27
